item.description: Lets watch the Patriots (or someone lucky enough to survive a game with them) win the Superbowl. No Cover, Free Pizza all day, great people and a great night. Best Superbowl Party as we have our own room at the Courtside and it is the Official next season Home of the Official local NE Patriots Fan Club. Check out www.bostoncharitywork,org or www.newenglandsingles.org for more info
item.name: Superbowl Party Attendance now over 60 meetup members
